mapper.insert: insert into memberCard (id, balance, state, `level`, bankid) values (#{id}, #{balance}, #{state}, #{level}, #{bankid});
mapper.select: select memberCard.id as id, memberCard.balance as balance, memberCard.state as state, memberCard.level as level, memberCard.bankid as bankid, memberCard.suspenddate as suspenddate, memberCard.destroydate as destroydate from memberCard, student where student.id = #{sid} and memberCard.id = student.memberid;
mapper.update: update memberCard set balance = #{balance}, state = #{state}, suspenddate = #{suspenddate}, destroydate = #{destroydate}, `level`= #{level} where id = #{id}
